item.title: Google Vault
item.dc:creator: easyG

item.content:encoded:
Google has announced [and is deploying] Google Vault. What is it?

Vault is Google's native solution which appears to have evolved from the acquisitionn of Postini in September 2007. The two services are similar but not identical. Vault is an easy-to-use and cost-effective solution for managing and preserving important messages and data. When used properly, it reduces the costs of litigation, regulatory investigation and compliance actions. Vault costs $6/user/month. Learn more about Google Apps Vault.
